document_data.name: Maldobar
document_data.mainbody: '''Maldobar''' was a small village north of [[Sundabar]].
document_data.Geography: Maldobar was located {{SI|50|mile|k|long=yes}} north up the [[Dead Orc River]] from [[Sundabar]]. A hundred miles to the north of Maldobar was the [[Coldwood]].
document_data.Description: Maldobar was a small village. On the western outskirts of the village, against the mountain slopes, were the home and barn of the [[Thistledown (family)|Thistledown]] family.
document_data.Inhabitants:
The village inhabitants were [[human]] farmers. 

The only threats to the village were the [[goblin]]s and [[gnoll]]s in the area who occasionally came to raid.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1340}}, the Thistledown family were found gruesomely murdered in their house and barn. The culprit was believed to be the [[drow]] [[Drizzt Do'Urden]], owing to the presence of his [[scimitar]] at the scene. However, the true culprit was [[Ulgulu]] the [[barghest]]. Drizzt avenged the Thistledowns by slaying Ulgulu, but despite the belief of [[Dove Falconhand]] and her band that Drizzt was innocent, [[Roddy McGristle]] continued to pursue Drizzt and defame his name for years and across many borders.
document_data.Notable Inhabitants:
In [[1340 DR]]:
* [[Benson Delmo]], the mayor.
* [[Roddy McGristle]], a noted bounty hunter and fur trapper.
* The [[Thistledown]] family
** [[Markhe Thistledown]]
** [[Bartholemew Thistledown]], a farmer who had lived for all of his 45 years in Maldobar.
** [[Connor Thistledown]]
** [[Eleni Thistledown]]
